text: Aleksandr Tarasov may refer to the following people: *Alexander Tarasov (born 1958), Russian sociologist, politologist, culturologist, publicist, writer, and philosopher *Alexander Tarasov-Rodionov (1885–1938), Russian writer *Alexander Tarasov (figure skater) (born 1961), Russian pair skater *Alexander Tarasov (ice hockey) (born 1990), Russian ice hockey defenceman *Aleksandr Tarasov (footballer) (born 1972), Russian football player *Aleksandr Tarasov (pentathlete) (1927–1984), Soviet modern pentathlete
title: Aleksandr Tarasov
